author: Sruthi Shankar
title: Stock futures rise as tech stocks gain; inflation data awaited
text:
March 29, 2018 / 12:18 PM / in 20 minutes Wall St. climbs as tech rebounds to end tumultuous week Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
NEW YORK (Reuters) - Wall Street surged on Thursday, bringing an upbeat end to a tumultuous, holiday-shortened week as technology stocks rebounded. Traders work on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) in New York, U.S., March 26, 2018. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid 
The Dow Jones Industrial Average .DJI rose 311.56 points, or 1.31 percent, to 24,159.98, the S&P 500 .SPX gained 36.46 points, or 1.40 percent, to 2,641.46 and the Nasdaq Composite .IXIC added 114.22 points, or 1.64 percent, to 7,063.45. Reporting by Stephen Culp; Editing by James Dalgleish
